title: Community
subtitle: Discover original characters and AI artworks from the community.

seo.metaDescription: Explore original characters, AI anime images, and short videos shared by creators in the AnividAI community gallery. Discover trending works, save favorites, and get inspiration for your next creation.

intro.heading: Discover Anime AI Creations from the Community
intro.paragraph: The AnividAI community gallery brings together original characters, AI anime illustrations, and short video experiments from creators worldwide. Browse by content type, find trending styles, and collect inspiration before starting your next project.

contentGuide.heading: How to use the community gallery
items: Filter by OC, image, or video to quickly find the format you need.
Sort by trending, newest, or top to match your discovery goal.
Open any artwork detail to review model style, tags, and creator context.
Like and favorite works to build a personal inspiration collection.

items.question: What content can I find in the community gallery?
items.answer: You can discover public original characters, AI anime images, and AI-generated videos published by AnividAI users.

items.question: Can I use community works as creation references?
items.answer: Yes. Community content is designed to inspire your own workflow. You can review styles, prompts, and composition ideas before generating new work.

items.question: How do I discover high-quality creations faster?
items.answer: Use the filters and sorting controls together. Start from trending for popular content, then refine by type or generation subtype.

filters.drawerDescription: Adjust sorting to discover the artworks you like.

toasts.shareMoreComingSoon: More sharing options are coming soon
toasts.useOcComingSoon: OC reuse workflow is coming soon
